p: Hexane and ethanol extracts from O.F, ethyl acetate and ethanol extracts from L.S, ethanol extract from P.B, all extracts from P.F, and pentavalent antimonial (meglumine antimoniate) were not toxic. Alternatively, hexane, and dichloromethane extracts from L. salicifolia and P.B as well as dichloromethane and ethyl acetate extracts from O.F displayed high cytotoxicity in a manner similar to Amphotericin B.
